info.+content: A teenage race car driver named Speed goes on adventures with his girlfriend, his candy-crazed brother whose best friend is a monkey, and his mysterious brother Racer X (Real Name: Rex). His father, Pops, created the car he races in, the Mach 5.
"Mach Go Go Go" by Vocal Shop
"Superauto mach 5 go! go! go!" by I Cavalieri del Re [Italian version]
"Tama ni Nodoka ni" (たまにゃのどかに) by Vocal Shop
